meta.title: Tesla saves lives
meta.description: Tesla saved thousands of lives. You can save a life too!
meta.subtitle: We need more heroes. You can be a hero too. Find out more about how you can become a hero, start saving lives and make the world a better place

story.title: The problem
lines: Every year, toxic air pollution causes
about 5,500,000 early deaths worldwide,
40,000 in the UK, 9,000 in London.

story.title: The numbers
lines: There are more than 1.2 billion cars worldwide
that produce toxic air pollution, which cause
5,500,000 deaths all around the world.

story.title: Divide
lines: Divide the number of cars to the total deaths number
to get that each group of 218 gasoline drivers are responsible
for the early death of one of their own.

story.title: The light
lines: By driving an electric car like Tesla,
each 218 EV owners negate that number and
save a life each year.

story.title: Safety rating
lines: Tesla Model S Achieves Best Safety Rating
of Any Car Ever Tested.
This and the autopilot makes
Tesla save more lives every day.

story.title: Be a hero
lines: Saving lives is a job for ones with the heart of a hero!
Be a hero and join Tesla family or the EV owners club.

story.title: How
lines: Buy a Model S or Model X today!
Any other EV alternative would do just fine.
Small pocket size? Check the upcoming Tesla model 3.

story.title: Model 3
lines: When the 400,000 preorders will be delivered
Just those Model 3 will save
1834 lives each year!
